title: TCS employees receive IT demands up to Rs 1.45 lakh; firm asks them to wait
description: TCS had in an internal memo on Tuesday had said it understood some employees have received income-tax demand notices and that it had taken up the matter with the tax authorities for fast resolution.
content: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) employees have received income-tax demands varying from Rs 50,000 to Rs 1.45 lakh even as the IT major asked them not to pay till the time it gets a clarification from the department, people aware of the development told ET.
cleaned_content: tata consultancy services tcs employees have received income tax demands varying from rs <FIVE_TEN_THOUSAND> to rs <ONE_> lakh even as the it major asked them not to pay till the time it gets a clarification from the department people aware of the development told et
